name: filter
notChannel: <#{{channel}}> is not a channel or i can't reach it (Check my permissions)

mode.name: mode
mode.include: Delete any file has none of the extensions
mode.exclude: Delete any file has one of the extensions

extensions.name: extensions
extensions.description: Extensions to include/exclude (Keep whitespace between each extension)

deleted.max: You can't' attach more than `{{max}}` file/s per message in <#{{channel}}>
deleted.exclude: The file format/s `{{extensions}}` isn't supported in <#{{channel}}>
deleted.include: You can only attach files that has one of the `{{extensions}}` format/s in <#{{channel}}>
